column4: I'm trying to add smb shares remotely, so all I have is an ssh session, how can I share folders without using the gui? Do I just need to edit /etc/samba/smb.conf and add in the folders and basically use the cd rom sample but change [cdrom]  to the name of the share, and the path to whatever the folder is?
just put the folders in your samba config fule restart samva and you're done
of course you habe to follow the syntax of the samba config file ;)
